评论概述: Nice outfit that will be used this winter
评论详情: Nice outfit, its a bit big for now but should fit well in a couple of months when winter comes around.

This outfit is such a "big boy" outfit! My grandson looks more and more like a little boy instead of a baby/toddler every day and this outfit takes that one step farther.  The clothes are well made and of a good weight for late fall and early winter. If you put a T-shirt on underneath the top, this would easily work in full-blown winter too, I think. The styling is great, with the quarter-zip, the texture, and the patch on the front.  Regarding sizing, I think these are pretty true to size. My grandson is 15 months old and these are a little big for him. He's a little big for his age (he's 33" tall and weighs about 25 pounds), so I think when he's a month or two older, these are going to fit perfectly.  Really pleased with this outfit!
Love how soft this set is and it fit true to size. Washed and dried well, and the design/color is great! Great feeling material and just the right thickness for fall/winter weather.
I cannot get over how cute this set is! The color is so vibrate and rich. The shirt and pants are both soft and seem very comfortable

We really love the sweatshirt in this set, so warm and stylish. Both pieces are well made but I really love the quality and detail of the sweatshirt in particular. Perfect for fall/winter and I can't wait until my little guy is able to wear this!
A great fall/winter outfit. The fabric is a polyester blend and it seems to was fairly decent. The size was accurate.
Adorable set. Quality is amazing. Super soft and comfy.

评论概述: cute fall outfit for toddler boys
评论详情: I bought this fall outfit for my two-year-old son. It fits true to size with a little room to grow. I love the quilted pattern on the sweater and the quality of the zipper with the pleather pull tab. Both the shirt and pants are very soft and seem cozy and comfortable. It's great for playtime, fall photos in the pumpkin patch, church, or other casual occasions. The only downside is that the "mama's boy" tag on the shirt was a little messed up, and I wish it said something else.
This is a very cute set, perfect for the winter or for those cold days that we get here in Texas. The material is soft and very comfortable. My son will look so cute wearing this outfit.
